function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Preprints with inaccurate information leading to misguided policies","Impact":"Widespread transmission of the virus due to incorrect containment strategies","Mitigation":"Implement strict validation and fact-checking processes for preprints before informing policy decisions","Technologies":"Data validation tools, peer review platforms","People":"Public health agencies, policymakers, general public","Owner":"Research organizations, scientific journals"},{"Description":"Pre-symptomatic transmission not accounted for in contact tracing policies","Impact":"Inefficient containment of the virus, leading to increased spread","Mitigation":"Update contact tracing policies to include pre-symptomatic transmission data","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, real-time data tracking systems","People":"Public health agencies, contact tracers","Owner":"Public health agencies"},{"Description":"Overreliance on preprints without comprehensive review","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data leading to misinformation and confusion","Mitigation":"Encourage thorough review of multiple studies before forming policies or making public statements","Technologies":"Data analysis and synthesis tools, collaboration platforms","People":"Public health officials, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Professional organizations, research institutions"}]}
